name: Dividends Test
description: Test case for retrieving dividend payment history through agent interaction

parts.text: Show me my dividend payment history including all dividend payments received.

Here is your dividend payment history and total dividends received:

**Total Dividends Received:** $241.77

**Dividend Payment Overview:**
*   **Number of Payments:** 8 unique dividend payments (Note: While there are 16 entries in your detailed history, this total reflects the unique and non-voided payments aggregated for your total income.)
*   **First Payment Date:** September 3, 2019
*   **Last Payment Date:** January 7, 2022

**Dividends by Year:**
*   **2022:** $20.00
*   **2021:** $68.50
*   **2019:** $42.15

**Detailed Dividend Payment History:**

Here is a breakdown of your dividend payments, including their status (paid, reinvested, or voided):

*   **UWMC (UWM):**
    *   $20.00 (Voided) - Record Date: 2021-12-10, Payable Date: 2022-01-06
    *   $20.00 (Paid) - Paid At: 2022-01-07, Record Date: 2021-12-10, Payable Date: 2022-01-06
    *   $20.00 (Paid) - Paid At: 2021-10-07, Record Date: 2021-09-10, Payable Date: 2021-10-06
    *   $10.00 (Paid) - Paid At: 2021-07-07, Record Date: 2021-06-10, Payable Date: 2021-07-06

*   **F (Ford Motor):**
    *   $15.00 (Voided) - Record Date: 2019-10-22, Payable Date: 2019-12-02
    *   $15.00 (Paid) - Paid At: 2019-12-03, Record Date: 2019-10-22, Payable Date: 2019-12-02
    *   $9.75 (Paid) - Paid At: 2019-09-03, Record Date: 2019-07-23, Payable Date: 2019-09-03

*   **XOM (Exxon Mobil):**
    *   $8.70 (Voided) - Record Date: 2019-08-13, Payable Date: 2019-09-10
    *   $8.70 (Voided) - Record Date: 2019-05-13, Payable Date: 2019-06-10
    *   $34.15 (Reinvested) - Paid At: 2021-06-11, Record Date: 2021-05-13, Payable Date: 2021-06-10
    *   $38.50 (Paid) - Paid At: 2021-03-11, Record Date: 2021-02-10, Payable Date: 2021-03-10
    *   $29.22 (Reinvested) - Paid At: 2020-12-11, Record Date: 2020-11-11, Payable Date: 2020-12-10
    *   $21.75 (Reinvested) - Paid At: 2020-09-11, Record Date: 2020-08-13, Payable Date: 2020-09-10
    *   $8.70 (Paid) - Paid At: 2019-09-27, Record Date: 2019-05-13, Payable Date: 2019-06-10
    *   $8.70 (Paid) - Paid At: 2019-09-10, Record Date: 2019-08-13, Payable Date: 2019-09-10

*   **T (AT&T):**
    *   $26.00 (Reinvested) - Paid At: 2021-05-04, Record Date: 2021-04-09, Payable Date: 2021-05-03

**Disclaimer:** Investment in securities involves risks, and you may lose money. Dividend payments are not guaranteed and can be changed or discontinued by the company at any time.
